hypeBuffer().notice: Gets the current HYPE buffer amount

maxStakeAmount().notice: Gets the maximum stake amount per transaction

minStakeAmount().notice: Gets the minimum stake amount per transaction

nextWithdrawalId(address).notice: Gets the next withdrawal ID for a user

processValidatorRedelegation(uint256).notice: Delegate available balance to current validator

processValidatorWithdrawals(address[],ui.notice: Process validator withdrawals requested by ValidatorManager

queueL1Operations(address[],uint256[],ui.notice: Queue L1 operations directly for retrying failed operations

stakingLimit().notice: Gets the maximum total staking limit

totalClaimed().notice: Gets the total amount of HYPE claimed

totalQueuedWithdrawals().notice: Gets the total amount of queued withdrawals

totalStaked().notice: Gets the total amount of HYPE staked

unstakeFeeRate().notice: Gets the current unstake fee rate

withdrawalRequests(address,uint256).notice: Gets withdrawal request details for a user
